website_summaries.verdict: Runners and walkers who prefer well-ventilated shoes without socks will like the Rocket Boost. The energy recovery and spring are excellent, but the fit can be narrow. Good for indoor exercise.
pros: Lightweight and ideal for treadmill running
cons: Does not repel water well (better on dry surfaces)
Not ideal for cold weather conditions

customer_reviews.title: A wonderful running shoe!
customer_reviews.text: I love this shoe. I bought my wife a pair after a running specialist recommended it to us and after her raving about them, I bought a pair for myself. This is one of the best pair of running shoes I have ever owned. You can actually feel the extra bounce they put in your step. The only reason I gave them four stars is because they are not very good for cross training but they are amazing for running!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Ariosa

customer_reviews.title: WOWOWOW
customer_reviews.text: WOWOWOW! Perfect blend of comfort and support. Very unique bouncy feel. I have adidas boost technology in my golf shoes so I got these and absolutely love them. Note, these are ventilated to the extreme for coolness, so they aren't waterproof. But they are the most comfortable running shoes I've ever gotten. Also, I got them one half size larger for the perfect fit because unless they say wide fit, adidas tend to run small for anyone who doesn't have a narrow foot.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Great running shoes
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are quite comfortable. They give the extra bounce needed when running. Take note that there are "vents" in the shoes, which provides great airflow to keep your feet cool. Those vents, however, aren't the most ideal in winter, but during the summer months, I expect them to be quite helpful!
customer_reviews.author: Chris Davis

customer_reviews.title: I love these sneakers and use them to run
customer_reviews.text: I love these sneakers and use them to run. I have gone through 2 pairs, but that's just due to normal wear and tear. They have been the most comfortable running shoes I've tried and offer a lot of support. I plan to buy them again and again.
customer_reviews.author: Geovanna Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Dynamite running shoes
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes. I usually wear stability shoes. These are just as good and so light! I shaved almost a minute off my 1 mile split. When they go on sale again I am buying more.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Parry

customer_reviews.title: Boosted.
customer_reviews.text: Had previously tried these on in an adidas store and looked online for a different color way. They are perfect though! Fits like a glove, I usually wear them without socks but if I got running I usually wear a pair. I tried on a pair of lunar flyknits and lunarglides before trying these guys on and I felt the best of those two shoes in these. Main use is working out but as I stated I run occasionally.
customer_reviews.author: Manny L. A.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: favorite shoe for running. not cross training but running yes.
customer_reviews.author: farleyfive

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you are on dry surface
customer_reviews.text: These are great shoes. they are comfortable as well. My one complaint is that water gets in them easily. If its raining or even wet outside I will not wear these because the vent on the bottom is an open hole for water to get in. Other than that these are great gym shoes and they slip on and off easily. I am glad I got these on Todays Deals for 60% off.
customer_reviews.author: Curtis

customer_reviews.title: Super light, very comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes. They are super light, just a slight warning don't step in any small puddles. The bottom of them is open.
customer_reviews.author: douglas dunn

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable shoe!!
customer_reviews.text: Overall, one of the most comfortable shoes I've ever worn. The boost foam is top notch stuff. Way more comfortable than Nike frees. Great support, comfort, and stability. I also love the air vents on the bottom, they definitely work to keep your feet cool! No need for socks with these. Awesome product.
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are decent, but I find they fit a bit narrow.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Shoe for Sweaters
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves his shoes! What little sweat he would have on his feet from working out is no longer the case. His feet are virtually dry from the mesh uppers and the vent in the bottom. The "boost" soles (sponge-like material) are amazingly supportive and comfortable for workouts...so much so that he is considering getting another style of "boost" for his everyday wear. I also have a women's version of this site and love mine as well. We even convinced a friend of ours to buy "boost" shoes for her boxing class and she loves hers too. We all highly recommend this product to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: JWGlendale

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: I can't recall a more comfortable pair of sneakers that I've owned. My only complaint is the air vent in the arch of the sole. Avoid standing water if you aren't into soggy socks.
customer_reviews.author: Tara Horton

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great comfort and support, right out of the box !
customer_reviews.author: Timothy D.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Shoes are very lightweight and comfortable. Used as walking shoes or everyday athletic shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Hal Young

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes. You get tons of "Boost foam" on ...
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes. You get tons of "Boost foam" on the bottom and it isn't a gimmick. The foam definitely feels way better than the average foam. I could walk all day in these comfortably and these shoes make me look forward to running.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too narrow!!
customer_reviews.text: For me, this shoe was terrible because it was too narrow. However, I gave it three stars because I recognize that may not be true for everyone. I just wish I hadn't wasted my time on a shoe that is more narrow than most others (Nike & Saucony, the other shoes I've worn consistently).
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: BEST SHOES EVER!
customer_reviews.text: First of all these shoes are very light and comfy they are very responsive but at the same time soft(via boost) they look great and feel even better you will definitely want to go one half size bigger because of the mesh upper they fit perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Jodi L. Dennett

customer_reviews.title: THE MOST COMFORTABLE SHOES I'VE WORN IN MY ENTIRE LIFE
customer_reviews.text: THE MOST COMFORTABLE SHOES I'VE WORN IN MY ENTIRE LIFE. Seriously, they are. This foam layer under the shoes is magical. I hate getting the shoes off because walking with them is just so comfortable. Once I need to replace them, I'm not gonna think twice, I'll buy they same pair again. Maybe a different color for change, but I found the shoes that I could use forever. Whether it's running or a just a daily use, no shoes can be more comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Ray Tawil

customer_reviews.title: Great for a hot sunny day
customer_reviews.text: The springy/soft soles helped me keep running when my foot was hurting from muscle pain. Nice and cool choice for my warm location (Hawaii). These shoes provide no protection from water in puddles.
customer_reviews.author: L L P

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: They're amazing, just never use them on a wet surface.
customer_reviews.author: Dequane

customer_reviews.title: Great running shoes
customer_reviews.text: Great running shoes. I usually run in Nike or Asics, but these are as comfortable as any version of either. I don't know if all Adidas are like these, but they're great.
customer_reviews.author: R. Allison

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe at a great price. Even my kids like to see me wearing them instead of "boring" sneakers
customer_reviews.author: Paul Munsie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Full hand Cushion + ClimCool tech = super light and super comfortable! Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Shoe Fan

customer_reviews.title: Running on little clouds
customer_reviews.text: Super light, great snug fit in the neoprene heels and very shock absorbent. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: M. O'Brien

customer_reviews.title: Boost is real!
customer_reviews.text: Most comfortable shoes ever is not hyperbole. Super springy while running. Great comfort while walking. These shoes are meant to have excellent ventilation so I don't see why people give it a lower star for not being water proof. Flawless comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe! It's super light, and flat foot friendly. I use it mainly for running on a track
customer_reviews.author: Jorel E

customer_reviews.title: Fits Like a Glove, and is Ultra Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shoes for running, and I am not disappointed. The boost foam is heavenly, and the shoes breathe really well. Plus, these shoes fit like a glove, but still are able to flex a bit. They're also quite durable. I've had them for a little over 6 months, and not one rip or tear has appeared. My only disclaimer is that you should stay away from water in these shoes. The vent on the bottom helps let heat and moisture out while running, but also lets water flow through the bottom into your sock if you step on a puddle. I'd definitely buy these shoes again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: adidas Men's CC Rocket Boost Running Shoe
product_meta.description: For best in class climachill look no further. In addition to the 360-degree active ventilation, natural comfort, and webbed outsole, the full-length boost foam midsole takes your run up a notch.
